gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Cursor
Class TranslationJPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.UI.ActiveJPanel
                      gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Panels.Transforms.CoordJPanel
                          gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Cursor.TranslationJPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreserveState, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class TranslationJPanel
extends CoordJPanel

This class allows for the drawing of a translating box cursor. It is used by the TranslationOverlay to view different regions within an image too large for the viewport.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

TranslationJPanel

public TranslationJPanel()
Constructor adds listeners to this TranslationJPanel. This JPanel is also contructed to receive keyboard events.

enableStretch

public void enableStretch(boolean can_stretch)
Use this method to enable/disable the stretching ability of the viewport.

Parameters:
can_stretch - True to enable stretching, false to disable.

isStretchEnabled

public boolean isStretchEnabled()
Use this method to find out if stretching is enabled.

Returns:
True is enabled, false if disabled.

setViewPort

public void setViewPort(CoordBounds viewport)
Set the size of the viewport. This method must be called whenever the local bounds of the CoordJPanel are changed. Also call this method to initialize a viewport size.

Parameters:
viewport - CoordBounds representing the viewable area.

setViewPort

public void setViewPort(floatPoint2D vp1,
                        floatPoint2D vp2)
Set the size of the viewport. This method must be called whenever the local bounds of the CoordJPanel are changed. Also call this method to initialize a viewport size.

Parameters:
vp1 - Top-left corner of the viewable area.
vp2 - Bottom-right corner of the viewable area.

setGlobalPanelBounds

public void setGlobalPanelBounds(CoordBounds global)
Set the bounds for the entire image. This method must be called whenever the global bounds of the CoordJPanel are changed. Also call this method to initialize the global bounds.

Parameters:
global - CoordBounds representing the entire possible viewable area.

getBoxCursor

public XOR_PanCursor getBoxCursor()
Currently the only type of pan cursor is the box pan cursor, so this method will return that cursor.

Returns:
box The XOR_PanCursor responsible for the visual transformation.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
